message.body: Are you busy today? And have you had your MMR shot? We're having a little party with just my parents My inlaws, James' best friend and my sister I know it's really short notice- but do you want to come? It starts at 2:30
I'm sorry I have been so absorbed in mommydom that I have been terrible about keeping in touch
It's Lillian's first birthday today! If not no worries -

Omg YES I want to come!!!! I have a meeting at 4 so I can only stop by for a bit but I absolutely want to meet her!!! You are totally allowed to be in mommydom and GUESS WHAT Alec and I are expecting a kid too! I was going to call you today to tell you; we haven't told many people! I'll be there!
ï¿¼Lillian will be a year and a half older so maybe they can play together in a few years!!??
(Ps if this is too late of a response from me it is ok! I left my phone in the car so I just saw the text now
Oh my God! How wonderful! Congratulations!
It's over at 4:30- so Let's just decide on a time to meet up instead- I'm so happy you!
I meant I am so happy for you!
Haha yayayay! Yes, let's meet up. Tell me when and I'll drive to you and maybe we can get lunch. See you soon. Tell Lillian happy bday!!
